title: "Robotics project aims at preventing covid in poultry plants"
excerpt: "The covid-19 pandemic strained many poultry processing plants as employees became ill. With the help of a $1 million grant, Arkansas Agricultural Experiment Station researchers will soon begin designing robotics to help alleviate that potential strain."
